::RebelYell::
"Allright, Ive locked onto your signal. Ill see you
soon." RebelYell walked over to the pod and salvaged
as many parts as he could carry.Activating the jet
pack on his back, he took off and headed in the
direction of Spears' signal.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She heard the message oveer her link. "Yeah I hear
> you. Come on in 
> and we can talk. Just home in on the signal from my
> transmission.I'm 
> at the ARK. Also, if you can bring anything from
> pod, do so. We will 
> need it."
> 
> She walked over to the bridge and looked at the
> scematics of the 
> ship.  She shook her head.  It would take a miracle
> to keep this ship 
> from falling apart.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > :::RebelYell:::
> > 
> >     RebelYell stood for a moment lost in his
> thoughts
> > as the snow fell around him. He decided that the
> only
> > thing to do is try the comm. "I just hope this
> planet
> > has a lot of Preds to slag" he thought. He opened
> the
> > com link and transmitted on all Maximal channels.
> "Any
> > Maximals that can hear me, my name is RebelYell
> and Im
> > here to join you. Please respond."
